body:
@Flamescione, ohhh what original insults, your dick TiNY? Haha im so original.
I never said they had to suck off every male, where did you read that? Also what point is the "therefore" reffering to? I don't see one

Also @elipotheweeb 
Well, girls not attracted to opposite gender is maybe a mental ilness, but that doesn't mean they have to suck every male dicks they encountered (especially a tiny and unwashed one like yours)
Therefore, Yuri is not a waste of females, if ya don't like this genre, there are tons of generic harem shit on this site lol
lmfao this comment section is goldmine
thats why i hate homophobes-- their mindsets are unreasonable shit, btw this doujin is wholesome

@soxingcali lesbians should be arrested to work as sex slaves, "blah blah respect people's choice" idgaf, not being attracted to the opposite gender in order to procreate is literally a mental illness
Males are a waste of oxygen.
You think yuri is a waste of females, I think anything is a waste of something that could’ve been yuri, we are not the same

@elipotheweeb That means you think women, for some reason, have the duty to be with men. No one owes anyone anything; a woman doesn’t have the responsibility to un-single any single man, just like a man doesn’t have to date any particular woman if he doesn’t want to. Let the gays and lesbians live their lives man.
they're not a waste if they make me horny
Lesbians are a waste of females, go on, try to change my mind
It is hard having a coloured item like the blue cups as it is black and white
